title: Give UC Davis - One Gift. Endless Possibilities.
body:
COVID-19 Response Learn More













Ways to Give


Impacts of Giving


Areas to Support















Search results










Whose world will you change?
A gift to UC Davis can make a world of difference.


Give Now










One Gift.

Endless Possibilities.




Whatever your philanthropic passion may be—whether it is improving energy-efficient power, feeding the world, curing cancer or helping a student in need—you can find a way to support it by giving to UC Davis.

We invite you to help advance UC Davis’ excellence in teaching, research and public service for the betterment of our region, state, nation and world.

















food





water





society





environment





energy





arts








Support Student Success

A gift to UC Davis students can make a world of difference.
Join the team that is deeply committed to educating the next generation of leaders who will help solve some of California and the world’s most pressing challenges.

Make a gift
